Text: Actually it's not called Let Me In, the novel was renamed Let Me In for US readers, the US publishers thought that Let the Right One In was too long so they picked a shorter title, they were going to call it Let Her In but seeing that the use of the word "Her" is incorrect Lindqvist requested that they rename it Let Me In
